description:
Truth is...freedom costs something.

Courage.

3 Questions for face-mask fence-sitters: are you wearing a face mask because you are genuinely scared of catching an unidentified virusâ€”with near 100% recovery rate? Or are you wearing a face mask because you are scared of a fine, which goes against Australian federal law (and people who are challenging the fines are getting them nullified)? Or are you wearing a mask because you just want to fit in and are scared of being confronted by an aggressive mask-wearer (who probably doesnâ€™t want to wear a mask either)?

We know it can be intimidating to go mask-free but taking a stand for your personal rights and freedom is also very liberating. Itâ€™s an opportunity to find out what you are really made of: courage or fear?
